description:
Do you often find yourself staring at a blank screen/piece of paper, wondering why you can’t come up with a good idea?

This course is designed to provide professional creatives of any type - writers, designers, animators, musicians, and every other kind of creative field - with a proven technique for coming up with great ideas on demand.

You’ll learn how to:

  1. Never get stuck for ideas again. EVER.
  2. Break your own thinking patterns and surprise yourself.
  3. Get rid of clichés and mediocre ideas.
  4. Get your clients or supervisors on board with your ideas.
  5. Recognize and avoid common pitfalls that can really kill your ideas.

As a creative person I know you don’t have time - so I've made an effort to fit everything into a mean lean 60 minutes course. With careful pacing and plenty of cartoons, metaphors, examples and anecdotes, this course is as entertaining as it is useful.

“You don’t need inspiration to get ideas. Ideas stir up inspiration, not the other way around.”

Take the course now and find out how it all works!
title: Go Dream: How To Come Up With Great Ideas On Demand
